title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 390.2 - Basis of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 390.2 - Basis of award

State Regulations

Every award for a lump-sum payment on account of all, or
any part, of the remaining compensation due any claimant shall be based upon a
computation by the actuary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
390.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
